{"id":958077299,"question_id":3,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1685168200,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/958077299/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        \n        vector<char> visited;\n        int max_length = 0;\n        int length = 0;\n\n        if(s.length()==1){\n            max_length = 1;\n        }\n\n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++){\n\n            if(find(visited.begin(),visited.end(),s[i]) == visited.end()){\n                length += 1;\n                visited.push_back(s[i]);\n                cout<<\"Push \"<<s[i]<<endl;\n            }\n            else{\n                cout<<\"Found \"<<s[i]<<\"--> Clear --> Push \"<<s[i]<<endl;\n                if(max_length <= length){\n                    max_length = length;\n                }\n                visited.clear();\n                length = 0;\n                visited.push_back(s[i]);\n                length+=1;\n            }\n        }\n\n        if(max_length < length){\n            max_length = length;\n        }\n\n        return max_length;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
